00035 class Zend_Config_Ini extends Zend_Config
00036 {
00042     protected $_nestSeparator = '.';
00043 
00049     protected $_sectionSeparator = ':';
00050 
00056     protected $_skipExtends = false;

00100     public function __construct($filename, $section = null, $options = false)
00101     {
00102         if (empty($filename)) {
00106             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00107             throw new Zend_Config_Exception('Filename is not set');
00108         }
00109 
00110         $allowModifications = false;
00111         if (is_bool($options)) {
00112             $allowModifications = $options;
00113         } elseif (is_array($options)) {
00114             if (isset($options['allowModifications'])) {
00115                 $allowModifications = (bool) $options['allowModifications'];
00116             }
00117             if (isset($options['nestSeparator'])) {
00118                 $this->_nestSeparator = (string) $options['nestSeparator'];
00119             }
00120             if (isset($options['skipExtends'])) {
00121                 $this->_skipExtends = (bool) $options['skipExtends'];
00122             }
00123         }
00124 
00125         $iniArray = $this->_loadIniFile($filename);
00126 
00127         if (null === $section) {
00128             // Load entire file
00129             $dataArray = array();
00130             foreach ($iniArray as $sectionName => $sectionData) {
00131                 if(!is_array($sectionData)) {
00132                     $dataArray = array_merge_recursive($dataArray, $this->_processKey(array(), $sectionName, $sectionData));
00133                 } else {
00134                     $dataArray[$sectionName] = $this->_processSection($iniArray, $sectionName);
00135                 }
00136             }
00137             parent::__construct($dataArray, $allowModifications);
00138         } else {
00139             // Load one or more sections
00140             if (!is_array($section)) {
00141                 $section = array($section);
00142             }
00143             $dataArray = array();
00144             foreach ($section as $sectionName) {
00145                 if (!isset($iniArray[$sectionName])) {
00149                     require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00150                     throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Section '$sectionName' cannot be found in $filename");
00151                 }
00152                 $dataArray = array_merge($this->_processSection($iniArray, $sectionName), $dataArray);
00153 
00154             }
00155             parent::__construct($dataArray, $allowModifications);
00156         }
00157 
00158         $this->_loadedSection = $section;
00159     }
00160 
00173     protected function _loadIniFile($filename)
00174     {
00175         set_error_handler(array($this, '_loadFileErrorHandler'));
00176         $loaded = parse_ini_file($filename, true); // Warnings and errors are suppressed
00177         restore_error_handler();
00178         // Check if there was a error while loading file
00179         if ($this->_loadFileErrorStr !== null) {
00183             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00184             throw new Zend_Config_Exception($this->_loadFileErrorStr);
00185         }
00186 
00187         $iniArray = array();
00188         foreach ($loaded as $key => $data)
00189         {
00190             $pieces = explode($this->_sectionSeparator, $key);
00191             $thisSection = trim($pieces[0]);
00192             switch (count($pieces)) {
00193                 case 1:
00194                     $iniArray[$thisSection] = $data;
00195                     break;
00196 
00197                 case 2:
00198                     $extendedSection = trim($pieces[1]);
00199                     $iniArray[$thisSection] = array_merge(array(';extends'=>$extendedSection), $data);
00200                     break;
00201 
00202                 default:
00206                     require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00207                     throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Section '$thisSection' may not extend multiple sections in $filename");
00208             }
00209         }
00210 
00211         return $iniArray;
00212     }
00213 
00225     protected function _processSection($iniArray, $section, $config = array())
00226     {
00227         $thisSection = $iniArray[$section];
00228 
00229         foreach ($thisSection as $key => $value) {
00230             if (strtolower($key) == ';extends') {
00231                 if (isset($iniArray[$value])) {
00232                     $this->_assertValidExtend($section, $value);
00233 
00234                     if (!$this->_skipExtends) {
00235                         $config = $this->_processSection($iniArray, $value, $config);
00236                     }
00237                 } else {
00241                     require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00242                     throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Parent section '$section' cannot be found");
00243                 }
00244             } else {
00245                 $config = $this->_processKey($config, $key, $value);
00246             }
00247         }
00248         return $config;
00249     }
00250 
00261     protected function _processKey($config, $key, $value)
00262     {
00263         if (strpos($key, $this->_nestSeparator) !== false) {
00264             $pieces = explode($this->_nestSeparator, $key, 2);
00265             if (strlen($pieces[0]) && strlen($pieces[1])) {
00266                 if (!isset($config[$pieces[0]])) {
00267                     if ($pieces[0] === '0' && !empty($config)) {
00268                         // convert the current values in $config into an array
00269                         $config = array($pieces[0] => $config);
00270                     } else {
00271                         $config[$pieces[0]] = array();
00272                     }
00273                 } elseif (!is_array($config[$pieces[0]])) {
00277                     require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00278                     throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Cannot create sub-key for '{$pieces[0]}' as key already exists");
00279                 }
00280                 $config[$pieces[0]] = $this->_processKey($config[$pieces[0]], $pieces[1], $value);
00281             } else {
00285                 require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00286                 throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Invalid key '$key'");
00287             }
00288         } else {
00289             $config[$key] = $value;
00290         }
00291         return $config;
00292     }
